chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
D: cpo
s: Pred D
C: chain_closed s
u: chain tp

Goal:
lim [sval^^ubysval_mono] \In s

Premises:
chain_closed = fun T : cpo => [Pred s | bot \In s /\ (forall d : chain T, d <=p s -> lim d \In s)] : forall T : cpo, Simpl_Pred (Pred T) Arguments chain_closed {T}
Notation sval := ssrfun.sval
Notation lim := @CPO.lim
Pred = fun T : Type => T -> Prop : Type -> Type Arguments Pred _%type_scope
List.In : forall A : Type, A -> seq A -> Prop
Record chain (T : poset) : Type := Chain { pred_of : Pred T; _ : chain_axiom pred_of } Arguments Chain [T pred_of]
limP : forall (D : cpo) (s : chain D) (x : D), x \In s -> x <== lim s
Mem_map_inv : ?x \In [seq ?f i | i <- ?s] -> exists y : ?T, ?x = ?f y /\ y \In ?s where ?T : [D : cpo s : Pred D C : chain_closed s u : chain tp |- Type] ?T' : [D : cpo s : Pred D C : chain_closed s u : chain tp |- Type] ?f : [D : cpo s : Pred D C : chain_closed s u : chain tp |- ?T -> ?T'] ?x : [D : cpo s : Pred D C : chain_closed s u : chain tp |- ?T'] ?s : [D : cpo s : Pred D C : chain_closed s u : chain tp |- seq ?T]
limM : forall (D : cpo) (s : chain D) (x : D), (forall y : D, y \In s -> y <== x) -> lim s <== x
app_mono : forall x : ?A, monotone (@^~ x) where ?A : [D : cpo s : Pred D C : chain_closed s u : chain tp |- Type] ?T : [D : cpo s : Pred D C : chain_closed s u : chain tp |- poset]
chain_clos_diag : forall (T : cpo) (s : Pred (T * T)), chain_closed s -> chain_closed [Pred t | (t, t) \In s]
dapp_mono : forall x : ?A, monotone (@^~ x) where ?A : [D : cpo s : Pred D C : chain_closed s u : chain tp |- Type] ?T : [D : cpo s : Pred D C : chain_closed s u : chain tp |- ?A -> poset]
eq_sig_ind : forall Q : ?u = ?v -> Prop, (forall (p : sval ?u = sval ?v) (q : eq_rect (sval ?u) [eta ?P] (proj2_sig ?u) (sval ?v) p = proj2_sig ?v), Q (eq_sig ?u ?v p q)) -> forall p : ?u = ?v, Q p where ?A : [D : cpo s : Pred D C : chain_closed s u : chain tp |- Type] ?P : [D : cpo s : Pred D C : chain_closed s u : chain tp |- ?A -> Prop] ?u : [D : cpo s : Pred D C : chain_closed s u : chain tp |- {a : ?A | ?P a}] ?v : [D : cpo s : Pred D C : chain_closed s u : chain tp |- {a : ?A | ?P a}]
eq_sig_rec : forall Q : ?u = ?v -> Set, (forall (p : sval ?u = sval ?v) (q : eq_rect (sval ?u) [eta ?P] (proj2_sig ?u) (sval ?v) p = proj2_sig ?v), Q (eq_sig ?u ?v p q)) -> forall p : ?u = ?v, Q p where ?A : [D : cpo s : Pred D C : chain_closed s u : chain tp |- Type] ?P : [D : cpo s : Pred D C : chain_closed s u : chain tp |- ?A -> Prop] ?u : [D : cpo s : Pred D C : chain_closed s u : chain tp |- {a : ?A | ?P a}] ?v : [D : cpo s : Pred D C : chain_closed s u : chain tp |- {a : ?A | ?P a}]
chain_clos_idemp : forall (T : cpo) (s : Pred T), chain_closed s -> chain_closure s =p s
eq_sig : forall (u0 v : {a : ?A | ?P a}) (p : sval u0 = sval v), eq_rect (sval u0) [eta ?P] (proj2_sig u0) (sval v) p = proj2_sig v -> u0 = v where ?A : [D : cpo s : Pred D C : chain_closed s u : chain tp |- Type] ?P : [D : cpo s : Pred D C : chain_closed s u : chain tp |- ?A -> Prop]
chain_closI : forall (T : cpo) (s1 s2 : Pred T), chain_closed s1 -> chain_closed s2 -> chain_closed (PredI s1 s2)
chain_clos_min : forall (T : cpo) (s : Pred T) (t : Pred_Class), s <=p t -> chain_closed t -> chain_closure s <=p t
rew_sig : forall (Q : forall a : ?A, ?P a -> Prop) (u0 : {p : ?P ?x | Q ?x p}) (y : ?A) (H : ?x = y), eq_rect ?x (fun a : ?A => {p : ?P a | Q a p}) u0 y H = exist (Q y) (eq_rect ?x ?P (sval u0) y H) match H as x in (_ = a) return (Q a (eq_rect ?x ?P (sval u0) a x)) with | erefl _ _ => proj2_sig u0 end where ?A : [D : cpo s : Pred D C : chain_closed s u : chain tp |- Type] ?x : [D : cpo s : Pred D C : chain_closed s u : chain tp |- ?A] ?P : [D : cpo s : Pred D C : chain_closed s u : chain tp |- ?A -> Type]
prop_lim = fun s : chain [posetofProp] => exists p : [posetofProp], p \In s /\ p : chain [posetofProp] -> [posetofProp]
prop_limP : forall (s : chain [posetofProp]) (p : [posetofProp]), p \In s -> p <== prop_lim s
lat_limP : forall (A : lattice) (s : chain A) (x : A), x \In s -> x <== lat_lim s
chain_closP : forall (T : cpo) (s : Pred T), chain_closed (chain_closure s)
pair_limP : forall (A B : cpo) (s : chain [posetofA * B]) (x : [posetofA * B]), x \In s -> x <== pair_lim s
prop_limM : forall (s : chain [posetofProp]) (p : [posetofProp]), (forall q : [posetofProp], q \In s -> q <== p) -> prop_lim s <== p
CPOMixin : forall (T : poset) (mx_bot : T) (mx_lim : chain T -> T), (forall x : T, mx_bot <== x) -> (forall (s : chain T) (x : T), x \In s -> x <== mx_lim s) -> (forall (s : chain T) (x : T), (forall y : T, y \In s -> y <== x) -> mx_lim s <== x) -> CPO.mixin_of T
fun_limP : forall (A : Type) (B : cpo) (s : chain [posetofA -> B]) (x : [posetofA -> B]), x \In s -> x <== fun_lim s
lat_limM : forall (A : lattice) (s : chain A) (x : A), (forall y : A, y \In s -> y <== x) -> lat_lim s <== x
Record mixin_of (T : poset) : Type := Mixin { mx_bot : Poset.sort T; mx_lim : chain T -> T; _ : forall x : T, mx_bot <== x; _ : forall (s : chain T) (x : T), x \In s -> x <== mx_lim s; _ : forall (s : chain T) (x : T), (forall y : T, y \In s -> y <== x) -> mx_lim s <== x } Arguments CPO.Mixin [T mx_bot] [mx_lim]%function_scope (_ _ _)%function_scope
prop_supP : forall (s : Pred Prop) (p : Prop), p \In s -> p <== prop_sup s
prop_sup = fun s : Pred Prop => exists p : Prop, p \In s /\ p : Pred Prop -> Prop
sub_supX : forall (T : lattice) (s : Pred T), sup_closed s -> forall u : Pred (subPoset s), sub_sup' u \In s
pair_limM : forall (A B : cpo) (s : chain [posetofA * B]) (x : [posetofA * B]), (forall y : [posetofA * B], y \In s -> y <== x) -> pair_lim s <== x
fun_limM : forall (A : Type) (B : cpo) (s : chain [posetofA -> B]) (x : [posetofA -> B]), (forall y : [posetofA -> B], y \In s -> y <== x) -> fun_lim s <== x
supP : forall (T : lattice) (s : Pred T) (x : T), x \In s -> x <== sup s
dfun_limP : forall (A : Type) (B : A -> cpo) (s : chain (dfunPoset (fun x : A => B x))) (x : dfunPoset (fun x : A => B x)), x \In s -> x <== dfun_lim s

```coq
unfold lim, sval, ubysval_mono.
rewrite <- chain_clos_idemp with (s := s).
apply chain_clos_min.
+ apply C.
+ apply chain_closI.
  * apply chain_clos_min.
    - apply C.
    - apply chain_clos_idemp.
  * apply chain_clos_idemp.
Qed.

original: unfold lim, sval, ubysval_mono. rewrite <- chain_clos_idemp with (s := s). apply chain_clos_min. + apply C. + apply chain_closI. * apply chain_clos_min. - apply C. - apply chain_clos_idemp. * apply chain_clos_idemp.
